description: Hatanaka Kousaku is the protagonist of the story. A naturally talented boxer who cleared his Class-B boxing certificate at the age of 17, he is now 19 and on the cusp of greatness. What holds him back, however, is his gluttonous appetite, which has seen him shoot up through the weight classes into regions where his frame is just not up to the task. Win or lose, it is only by KO for Kousaku.
name: Hatanaka Kousaku
